sentences: Palun kiirustage, me hiljame juba! (Please hurry, we are already late!)
Kiirustades ta kaotas oma võtmed. (Hurrying, he lost his keys.)
Ära kiirusta, tee rahulikult. (Don't rush, do it calmly.)
context: The word 'kiirustage' is an imperative form of the verb 'kiirustada', meaning to hurry or rush. It’s commonly used when urging someone to move faster or complete a task quickly.
